title: Gentle Breath & Body Awareness
goal: Release gentle tension and calm the mind through focused breath.

steps.title: Comfortable Seated Pose (Chair or Cushion)
steps.instructions: Sit on a chair or cushion. Hands on lap. Spine tall, shoulders relaxed. Eyes closed or soft gaze.

steps.title: Natural Belly Breathing
steps.instructions: Breathe in gently through the nose, belly expands. Breathe out slowly through the nose, belly softens. Let breath flow naturally.

steps.title: Cat-Cow Pose
steps.instructions: Come to hands and knees. Inhale, arch back and lift head (Cow). Exhale, round spine and tuck chin (Cat). Flow gently with breath.

steps.title: Shoulder Roll Breathing
steps.instructions: Inhale to lift shoulders. Exhale to roll them down. Repeat slowly.

title: Soothing Relaxation & Grounding
goal: Create a sense of safety and deep inner peace.

steps.title: Supported Seated Pose with Hand on Heart/Belly
steps.instructions: Sit comfortably. One hand on heart, one on belly. Feel warmth and gentle movement under hands. Eyes closed or soft gaze.

steps.title: Heart-Belly Breath
steps.instructions: Inhale softly through nose. Feel hands rise. Exhale through nose. Feel hands fall. Stay connected to breath.

steps.title: Child's Pose (Balasana)
steps.instructions: Kneel on the floor, big toes touching, knees wide. Sit back on heels, fold forward, forehead to floor. Arms extended or alongside body.

steps.title: Neck Nod Breathing
steps.instructions: Inhale to hold chin up. Exhale gently to lower chin. Repeat mindfully 3-5 times.
